sense.gloss: not taking an examination, not having to take an examination

sdata.j: |↑無試験|↑↓むしけん↓で↑入学↑↓にゅうがく↓を↑許可↑↓きょか↓された。
sdata.e: I was admitted to school without having to take an entrance examination.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は|↑無試験|↑↓むしけん↓でその↑学校↑↓がっこう↓の↑入学↑↓にゅうがく↓が↑認↑↓みと↓められた。
sdata.e: He was admitted to that school without taking the exam.
